About this course::

With the next generation game consoles upon us, we now know that there are still polygon limits when it comes to our assets. There are however some really exciting things on the horizon for texture painting as well as lighting and rendering of these assets. 

This training will begin to introduce you to some of these techniques including using a physically based workflow which will give us highly realistic looking results.
